name: Mariusz Jan Skobel
profile_summary:
Results-driven Senior Multimedia Engineer with 10+ years of experience in delivering high-performance software solutions specializing in multimedia processing. Expert in **C**, **C++**, and **Python**, with comprehensive knowledge of **FFmpeg**, **GStreamer**, and video/audio codecs for efficient media handling. Proven proficiency in developing and optimizing applications for **Linux**, **Windows**, and **OSX** environments. Adept at working with streaming protocols such as **DASH**, **HLS**, and **WebRTC** to build seamless multimedia solutions. Solid understanding of build systems and tools, including **CMake**, **autotools**, and **meson**, along with practical experience in **Visual Studio** and **XCode**.

Possessing strong problem-solving capabilities and excellent communication skills, I have a strong background in modern development practices, including CI/CD automation and cloud-native applications. Passionate about leveraging my technical expertise to create innovative systems that enhance user experience and drive impactful results.
